alert.note: Alert for Miami; Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN SHELBY, NORTHERN PREBLE, SOUTHEASTERN DARKE, NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND WESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Versailles to 7 miles southwest of Eaton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Sidney, Piqua, Englewood, Greenville, Eaton, West Milton, Versailles, Covington, Arcanum, Bradford, Lewisburg, West Alexandria, Pleasant Hill, Clayton, Union, Brookville, Webster, Russia and Phillipsburg. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 4 and 25. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 73 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
